email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this email finds you well.

We have the MV SEA HORIZON (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 290m) available for your iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. The cargo size is 160,000MT on CIF terms. The starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per ton. Laycan is 15-20 November. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the offer. USD 18.50 seems a bit high compared to the current market rates. Can you improve the rate to USD 17.75? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Michael Anderson
Global Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your response. I can offer USD 17.90 per ton. The demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day, pro rata. Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

USD 17.90 is better. Can we push it to USD 17.80? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 16-21 November?

Best regards,
Michael Anderson
Global Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

USD 17.80 is acceptable. Laycan adjusted to 16-21 November. Please confirm your acceptance.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
Michael Anderson
Global Chartering

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Here is the summary of terms:
- Vessel: MV SEA HORIZON
- Cargo: 160,000MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 16-21 November
- Freight: USD 17.80 per ton
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day, pro rata
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Solutions
